name: dressing_getProgress
description: This function is used to check the progress status of the air dresser's operation.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to check the progress.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: A group action identifier if applicable.
